title: Person

xdm:maritalStatus.description: Describes a person's relationship with a significant other.
xdm:maritalStatus.title: Marital Status

xdm:birthDate.description: The full date a person was born.
xdm:birthDate.title: Birth date

xdm:taxId.description: The Tax / Fiscal ID of the person, e.g. the TIN in the US or the CIF/NIF in Spain.
xdm:taxId.title: Tax ID

xdm:birthDayAndMonth.description: The day and month a person was born, in the format MM-DD. This field should be used when the day and month of a person's birth is known, but not the year.
xdm:birthDayAndMonth.title: Birth date

xdm:nationality.description: The legal relationship between a person and their state represented using the ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 code.
xdm:nationality.title: Nationality

xdm:birthYear.description: The year a person was born including the century, for example, 1983.  This field should be used when only the person's age is known, not the full birth date.
xdm:birthYear.title: Birth year
